summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, amending Sections 23.30.010, 23.32.016, 23.34.126, 23.34.128, 23.41.004, 23.41.012, 23.42.106, 23.42.126, 23.42.128, 23.47.004, 23.47.012, 23.48.002, 23.48.008, 23.48.010, 23.48.012, 23.48.014, 23.48.016, 23.48.018, 23.48.020, 23.48.024, 23.48.031, 23.48.032, 23.48.034, 23.53.010, 23.53.015, 23.53.030, 23.54.015, 23.54.020, 23.54.030, 23.55.030, 23.84.048, 25.05.675; adding a new Section 23.48.019; and amending the Official Land Use Map to rezone areas within and abutting the South Lake Union Urban Center from Commercial (C) and Neighborhood Commercial (NC) zones to the Seattle Mixed zone.
